description:
NOW ON SALE!! $0.99 FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY!!!

STAFF FAVORITE #1 - USA, BRAZIL, COSTA RICA, QATAR, SOUTH AFRICA, MEXICO

THE FASTEST & MOST BEAUTIFUL OFFLINE DICTIONARY IN THE PALM OF YOUR HAND

- FEATURED ON ITUNES FRONT PAGE
- TOP 50 UTILITIES IN USA,  CANADA, HONG KONG, SINGAPORE AND 23 OTHER COUNTRIES

Need to find the meaning of a word? Definition comes to your rescue!

Definition is the FASTEST and most BEAUTIFUL OFFLINE dictionary for your iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch. Results are INSTANT!

CUSTOMER REVIEWS:
5/5 stars - "This is a beautifully executed app. The hard work shows.", James Smallridge
5/5 stars - "Truly an amazingly beautiful app! This is a must have app!", shyboyfriend
5/5 stars - "This app is fantastic. It has everything and more.", Pikesmatrix
5/5 stars - "Nicest lightweight dictionary in iTunes!", rshkhsee
5/5 stars - "This app claims to be fast and lives up to its promise", Prokey

FEATURES:
*Delivers instant results as you type (EXTREMELY FAST!)
*Preloaded with an offline database
*Suggests words as you type
*Swipe for different definitions
*Bookmark a word to save for later use
*Shake for a random word
*Share a word (email, Facebook, Twitter)
*History of words
*Export your history or bookmarks
*Clipboard feature - define a word in your clipboard
*Compare two words (iPad only)
*Includes definitions and pronunciations in text & sound
*Thesaurus included
*Define in Safari (type define://YOURWORD)
*Provides synonyms, antonyms, and even example sentences INSTANTLY!

What are you waiting for? 

Get it now!

For support, please email feedback@definitionapp.com.
releaseNotes:
- Added iPhone 5 support

Stay tuned for version 5.
